messages.title: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is critical to your own security and prosperity.

messages.title: THIS IS A UNIQUE AND CRUCIAL ELECTION FOR OUR COUNTRY
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring the success of Brexit to protect national interest, security, and economic prosperity.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn or strong and stable leadership with Theresa May.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is crucial for Britain's national interest. Without the right deal, security and economic prosperity are at risk.
issues.economy: A strong negotiating hand in Brussels is necessary to guarantee our economic security.

images.caption: Theresa May and Alan Duncan a strong and stable leadership for Rutland and Melton, and for Britain.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet positions Theresa May against Jeremy Corbyn, highlighting the importance of strong leadership post-Brexit. Campaign material directly contrasts Theresa May's proposed stable leadership with the portrayed 'coalition of chaos' under Jeremy Corbyn.
